full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Building Cleaning Services at the Aluminum Technology Center Saguenay Site**

**Reference Number:** CB-389-79904062
**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 18, 2023, 14:00:00

**Overview**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking proposals for building cleaning services at the Aluminum Technology Center Saguenay Site. The successful supplier will provide comprehensive cleaning services to maintain cleanliness and hygiene at the various buildings and sites.

**Services**

The scope of work includes:

* Providing complete building cleaning services in an efficient and environmentally friendly manner
* Cleaning and maintaining all areas within each building, excluding those areas specifically excluded in accordance with building design, interior building decorations, and NRC/RPPM standards
* Inspecting areas for cleaning requirements, responding to service calls and complaints, and taking corrective action as necessary
* Supplying all materials, equipment, and tools necessary to perform the services
* Providing waste and recyclable collection services and transporting waste to a central collection location

**Excluded Services**

The following services are excluded from the scope of work:

* Collection of hazardous and chemical waste
* Disposal of waste and recyclable materials
* Removal of snow from sidewalks, traffic areas, and parking lots
* Maintenance of exterior furnishings
* Cleaning of high-level exterior perimeter windows (over 3m)
* Cleaning of outer and inner atrium windows of the central hall

**Trade Agreements**

The tender is open to suppliers from Canada and participating countries under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Submission Requirements**

Interested suppliers are required to submit their proposals electronically through the CanadaBuys platform. The proposal package must include a completed proposal form, proof of business registration, and any other required documentation.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Stéphane Lajoie
stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
(514
